trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Oakhurst
There were no other sightings in Oakhurst on or around July 29th 2013
Summary: strange looking plane, turned into star, then small tear drop shape, then gone
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking in town then i was what looked like a plane in the air, but it had no con trail and it had a shape that was unlike any plane i have ever seen. As i watched, it kept its path and turning into what i can only describe as a moving star. Then it changed shape again into a small round but almost tear drop shape. I crossed the road so i broke eye contact for a second and it was gone without a trace.
